name: Eslando Circular Fashion
description:
Eslando is a circular fashion tech company on a mission to accelerate textile recycling. Our purpose is to connect fashion brands with textile recyclers to build the most trusted, measurable and impactful relationships through products

Our Relabel Digital Product Passport is an innovative breakthrough technology solution that will accelerate recycling in the fashion industry through digitisation. Connecting brands with recyclers and engaging environmentally conscious consumers worldwide. We empower recyclers to increase the amount of clothing they can sustainably recycle and put back into the supply chain.

Our vision is to enable a greater volume of clothing to be recycled, reducing waste, increasing the supply of recycled materials and easing the burden the fashion industry places on our precious planet.

Eslando is committed to driving circularity at every stage of a garment's lifecycle, from its creation to its rebirth. With recycled fibres, we're creating tomorrow's fashion from yesterday's treasures, paving the way for a more sustainable future.
slogan: Accelerating textile recycling. Relabel Digital Product Passport for Textile Recycling
